properties.value:
FOR i in instances
FILTER i.object_type=="instance_workflow"
FILTER i.instance_id != i.root_workflow_id
properties.name: local_arango_parent_wf_query

FOR i in instances
FILTER i.object_type=="instance_workflow"

properties.script:
import json, sys
parent_wf_query = json.dumps(sys.argv[1])
plain_wf_query = json.dumps(sys.argv[2])
parent_wf_query_limits = json.dumps(sys.argv[3])
plain_wf_query_limits = json.dumps(sys.argv[4])
